item.title: About
item.description: This is about Dan’s multilingual blog, record problems and solutions in my tech grow process , and share my stories saved in my note book. If you like it, please click RSS in home page. The blogs of recommendation: https://duandahai.com/posts/20210607-real-time-monitoring-db/ The open projects by Dan: https://github.com/vekee/timecard-online https://github.com/vekee/DBMerge https://formsendbox.com If you are interesting in my project or want to know more, see at my GitHub.

item.title: The solutions for real time monitoring abnormal data in database
Contact
item.description: I’m a software engineer living with my family in Japan. I like read and music, I will very happy if you can share interesting books to me. If you are interesting in my bolgs or projects, please contact me. duandahai66@gmail.com.

item.title: Projects
item.description: DBMerge Diff tables in Oracle database with high speed. formsendbox Send mail web service. timecard-online Create and send timecard pdf by online.
